[OUTPUT]
1 from decimal import Decimal , getcontext
2 getcontext ( ) . prec = 200
3 n , d , x = map ( Decimal , input ( ) . split ( ) )
4 ans = 0
5 for i in range ( 1 , int ( n ) + 1 ) :## [STATE]i=[Decimal ( '1' ), Decimal ( '2' ), ..., Decimal ( '199996' )][/STATE] [STATE]range ( 1 , int ( n ) + 1 )=[range ( 1 , 199996 + 1 )][/STATE]
6     i = Decimal ( str ( i ) )
7     ans += Decimal ( str ( ( int ( n ) - int ( i ) + 1 ) ) ) / Decimal ( str ( i ) ) * ( d + x * Decimal ( str ( int ( n ) * 2 - 1 ) ) / Decimal ( "2" ) )
8 print ( ans )
[/OUTPUT]

[FILEPATH] k18bug-SOPT_SCP-b351cd0/Week4/simulated_data/clck037.py [/FILEPATH]
